bio.description: Sulman is an agricultural and environmental economist with a background in agricultural and applied economics. He holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Agricultural Education and Extension from the University of Nairobi. Currently, he is pursuing a Master of Science degree in Agricultural and Applied Economics, a joint program between the University of Nairobi and the University of Pretoria.
